title: Russia has become more dependent on China since Ukraine war began. Here's how
description: CNN's Selina Wang reports on the growing relationship between Russian President Vladimir Putin and China's leader Xi Jinping as they deepen their alliance by signing an economic deal and sharing similar views on the Ukraine war during the second day of Xi's visit to Russia.

title: UK accuses Russia of disinformation over depleted uranium
description: Russia is "deliberately trying to disinform," said the UK Ministry of Defense on Tuesday, after Russian President Vladimir Putin warned London against providing Ukraine with ammunition that contains depleted uranium.

title: New York Knicks great Willis Reed dies at 80
description: New York Knicks hero Willis Reed has died, the National Basketball Retired Players Association said Tuesday. He was 80 years old.

title: Ecuador opens terror investigation after journalists receive explosive devices in mail
description: Ecuador's public prosecutor has opened a terrorism investigation after at least five journalists received envelopes containing explosive devices.

title: Organic molecules found in sample from near-Earth asteroid
description: Organic molecules have been detected in samples collected by Japan's Hayabusa2 mission from the near-Earth asteroid Ryugu.

title: House GOP uses its new power in extraordinary effort to shield Trump from indictment
'Children are not the spoils of war': ICC Chief Prosecutor on Putin arrest warrant
description: Christiane Amanpour speaks with Prosecutor of the International Criminal Court, Karim Khan, on the court's decision to issue an arrest warrant for Putin over the alleged war crime of abducting Ukrainian children.

title: 'Marsupial sabertooth' had massive canines with roots that grew over the top of its skull
description: An unusual animal with canine teeth similar to those of a saber-toothed cat and the wide-set eyes of a cow lived in South America some 5 million years ago.

title: Gwyneth Paltrow in court as trial over 2016 ski collision begins
description: Trial over a 2016 skiing accident involving Gwyneth Paltrow began on Tuesday.

title: Feds proceed with caution as potential Trump indictment fuels sporadic calls for violence online
description: Federal officials, including those at the FBI and Department of Homeland Security, are monitoring what they say has been an uptick in violent rhetoric online including calls for "civil war" since former President Donald Trump asked supporters to "protest" what he said was his impending arrest.

title: 6.4-magnitude earthquake strikes Afghanistan, according to USGS
description: A 6.4-magnitude earthquake has struck Afghanistan, 40 kilometers south-southeast of the northeastern town of Jurm, according to the United States Geological Survey.

title: Russia will keep cutting oil output through June
description: Russian Deputy Prime Minister Alexander Novak said on Tuesday that Russia will continue a 500,000 barrels per day oil production cut until the end of June.

title: Engineers just made a cheesecake with a 3D printer
description: After some trial and error, researchers at Columbia University's Creative Machines Lab figured out how to 3D print a creamy, gooey cheesecake. Postdoctoral researcher Jonathan Blutinger explains the process and the technology that's just starting to emerge in the world of cooking.

title: 'Vibrant' Roman mosaic discovered under supermarket construction site
description: Archaeologists in England have discovered a "fantastic" Roman mosaic on land earmarked for a supermarket, suggesting a villa once occupied the site.

title: US tourist fined $500 for driving Ferrari into Florence's famous piazza
description: Getting behind the wheel of a bright red Ferrari sports car doesn't mean you can drive anywhere -- not even in Italy.

title: CNN anchor asks Djokovic if he regrets not getting vaccinated. Hear his response
description: CNN anchor Becky Anderson asks tennis star Novak Djokovic if he regrets not getting the Covid-19 vaccine. The 22-time Grand Slam winner is not allowed to travel to the US because of his decision not to be vaccinated against Covid-19.

title: UK counter terrorism police investigating after man set on fire near mosque
description: British counter terrorism police are investigating an attack on a man who was set on fire while he was walking home from a mosque in Birmingham, central England, on Monday.

title: Researchers 3D printed this cheesecake
description: Researchers have been pushing the limits of 3D printing for decades, using the manufacturing technique to churn out consumer goods such as furniture and shoes, human organs and even a rocket. But can the industrial technology be applied to make a fully baked dessert that can be fabricated in your home kitchen?

title: 'Mr. Pickles,' zoo's 90-year-old tortoise, stuns handlers with adorable surprise
description: 90-year old tortoise named Mr. Pickles is a stud. CNN's Jeanne Moos introduces his sweet little pickles.

title: TikTok says it has 150 million US users amid renewed calls for a ban
description: TikTok now has 150 million monthly active users in the United States, CEO Shou Chew confirmed on Tuesday, in a clear attempt to highlight the platform's vast and growing reach in the country amid renewed calls for a ban.

title: Video reportedly shows strike on train transporting Russian cruise missiles
description: Ukraine's Ministry of Defense said that a strike destroyed Russian "Kalibr" cruise missiles that were being transported by train in the town of Dzhankoi, in Russian-occupied Crimea.

title: A Nowruz like no other: Iranian Americans are celebrating their New Year with tempered spirits
description: Every spring, Mona Gorjestani eagerly awaits the arrival of Nowruz.

title: Allies are doing what the ex-president taught them: use government power to try to keep legal threats at bay
description: Donald Trump's Republican allies in the House are doing what the former president taught them to do -- use government power to try to keep his legal threats at bay.

title: US to accelerate delivery of tanks to Ukraine
description: The US will dramatically accelerate the time it takes to ship Abrams tanks to Ukraine by sending older M1-A1 models of America's main battle tank instead of the more modern version of the tank, according to two US officials.

title: Is this normal? California is facing its 12th atmospheric river this winter following a historic drought
description: California is bracing for yet another powerful, atmospheric river storm this week, continuing the onslaught of major weather whiplash after a yearslong, historic megadrought.

title: JPMorgan is advising First Republic on another potential lifeline, sources say
Google begins rolling out its ChatGPT rival
description: Google is opening up access to Bard, its new AI chatbot tool that directly competes with ChatGPT.

title: Fox producer claims she was 'bullied and intimidated' in Dominion case
description: A Fox News producer filed a pair of explosive lawsuits alleging that the network's lawyers coerced her into providing misleading testimony in Dominion Voting Systems' $1.6 billion defamation case against the company. CNN's Oliver Darcy has the latest.

title: Zach Braff says former partner Florence Pugh inspired his new film
description: Zach Braff says his new movie, "A Good Person," was heavily inspired by his ex-girlfriend, actress Florence Pugh.

title: Shaquille O'Neal shares reason for his hospitalization
description: Shaquille O'Neal's followers were worried when they saw on social media that he was in a hospital bed.

title: Video shows Irvo Otieno being pinned to the floor in the moments before his death
description: Surveillance video released by a prosecutor Tuesday shows Irvo Otieno being pinned to the floor by multiple security officers at a Virginia state mental health facility in the moments leading up to his death earlier this month.

title: Dominion wants Rupert and Lachlan Murdoch to testify at trial, court filing shows
description: Dominion wants to put Rupert Murdoch and his son Lachlan Murdoch on the witness stand at next month's expected defamation trial against Fox News, according to court filings.

title: Analysis: House GOP hasn't received the memo on Trump
description: Amid all the other uncertainties surrounding the possible indictment of Donald Trump, the flurry of events has made one thing unequivocally clear: the former president remains the center of the GOP universe.

title: Novak Djokovic says he has 'no regrets' missing Miami Open and Indian Wells over vaccination status
description: Novak Djokovic says he has "no regrets" at not being able to play at Indian Wells and the Miami Open in the US due to his vaccination status.

title: See the cloud of debris created when a spacecraft intentionally hit an asteroid
description: Telescopes around the world were watching when a NASA spacecraft intentionally crashed into an asteroid in September 2022.

title: Cuban catcher defects after World Baseball Classic, per report
description: After being eliminated from the World Baseball Classic by the US team in Miami on Sunday, the Cuban team landed in Havana on Monday without one of its players.

title: Latest on the banking crisis and global markets
Martina Navratilova says her prognosis is 'excellent' after double cancer diagnosis -- TalkTV interview
description: Tennis great Martina Navratilova says her "prognosis is excellent" having been diagnosed with throat and breast cancer.

title: Miami Dolphins officially exercise quarterback Tua Tagovailoa's fifth-year option
description: The Miami Dolphins officially exercised quarterback Tua Tagovailoa's fifth-year option on his rookie contract on Monday.

title: Israeli minister denies the existence of a Palestinian identity, inviting US rebuke
description: Israel's far-right Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich denied the existence of a Palestinian people or nationhood over the weekend, prompting a rebuke from the United States just weeks after calling for a Palestinian town to be "erased."

title: The 3D printed superyacht concept designed to be 'virtually invisible'
description: It's usually relatively difficult to fail to notice a superyacht, but this new concept from Jozeph Forakis Design has actually been designed to disappear into the background.

title: Rafael Nadal slips out of world top 10 for first time since 2005 as he recovers from injury
description: Tennis great Rafael Nadal has slipped out of the ATP top 10 for the first time since 2005 as he continues to regain his fitness.

title: Monet's dreamy haze was actually pollution
description: In a letter to his wife in March 1901, pioneering French painter Claude Monet lamented the bad weather that prevented him from working, as well as another conspicuous impediment to his creativity.

title: Saudi Arabia releases dual US-Saudi citizen from prison after he posted critical tweets about the kingdom
description: Saudi Arabia released US-Saudi dual national Saad Ibrahim Almadi from prison, more than a year after he was arrested for tweets critical of the kingdom, Almadi's son, Ibrahim, told CNN.

title: Paintings nearly 400 years old uncovered during kitchen renovation
description: Murals believed to be nearly 400 years old have been discovered at an apartment in northern England following a kitchen renovation.

title: Japan's PM heads to Kyiv for surprise meeting with Zelensky
US Treasury Secretary: Further rescues of depositors could be needed if smaller lenders suffer bank runs
description: The federal government could once again come to the rescue of uninsured bank depositors if smaller lenders suffer bank runs like the one that collapsed Silicon Valley Bank, according to prepared remarks from US Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen.

title: Indiana becomes second No. 1 seed to be knocked out of March Madness in successive days
description: First, it was the Stanford Cardinals -- then, it was the Indiana Hoosiers.

title: Five questions for Federal Reserve as banking crisis drags on
description: The Federal Reserve has a lot of balls in the air: Central bank officials are attempting to juggle their economic goals of maximum employment and price stability while maintaining financial safety and security in the midst of a banking meltdown.

title: He used to be the Assistant DA in Manhattan. Hear how likely he thinks a Trump arrest is
description: As New York and Washington DC prepare for a possible indictment of former President Donald Trump for his alleged role in a scheme to pay hush money to adult film star Stormy Daniels, CNN's Don Lemon talks to Former Assistant Manhattan District Attorney Jeremy Saland about the likelihood of an indictment and process.

title: Premier Leaue star Yoane Wissa on dealing with social media abuse
description: Brentford FC forward Yoane Wissa says he limits his time on social media because it can be a "dangerous" place for players and their families.

title: 'I killed a man today': Russian soldier accused of war crimes in absentia after audio files intercepted
description: • Russian cruise missiles destroyed in strike in Crimea, Ukraine says

title: Green Bay Packers president says he is 'under sworn secrecy' on Aaron Rodgers' future
description: Talk regarding an Aaron Rodgers trade has dominated the NFL off-season, but the Green Bay Packers president has remained coy on the future of the quarterback.

title: How much it has cost to rescue teetering banks
US dentist arrested for allegedly poisoning his wife had ordered arsenic and searched for 'how to make poison,' affidavit says
description: A Colorado dentist is accused of fatally poisoning his wife by allegedly putting arsenic in her protein shakes after ordering it online and making a number of suspicious internet searches in the weeks leading up to her death, including "how to make poison," according to an arrest warrant affidavit.

title: See the video at the center of a war crimes investigation against Russian forces
description: A 2022 attack by Russian forces on Ukrainian civilians near Izium, Ukraine, was caught on camera and is now at the center of a war crimes investigation.  CNN's Ivan Watson reports.

title: Global stocks rise as investor worries about global banking turmoil ease
description: European and Asian stocks rose Tuesday as concerns about the global banking sector eased in response to a whirlwind of intervention by policymakers and industry players.

title: Being 'socially frail' comes with health risks for older adults
description: Consider three hypothetical women in their mid-70s, all living alone in identical economic circumstances with the same array of ailments: diabetes, arthritis and high blood pressure.

title: JPMorgan, Deutsche Bank must face lawsuits over Jeffrey Epstein ties, judge says
description: JPMorgan Chase and Deutsche Bank must face lawsuits that accuse them of enabling Jeffrey Epstein's sex trafficking, a US judge said Monday.

title: New York, DC prepare for possible Trump indictment
description:
• Analysis: Attacks on Manhattan investigation show GOP still can't break from Trump
• Analysis: Republicans use Trump's playbook

title: Google suspends Chinese shopping app Pinduoduo over malware
description: Google has suspended Pinduoduo, a popular Chinese budget shopping app, from its Play Store after finding malware in versions of the app.

title: PSV Eindhoven imposes 40-year stadium ban on fan who attacked goalkeeper
description: Dutch football club PSV Eindhoven has imposed a 40-year stadium ban on a fan who invaded the pitch and attacked an opposition player.

title: Fox News producer files explosive lawsuits against the network, alleging she was coerced into providing misleading Dominion testimony
description: A Fox News producer on Monday filed a pair of explosive lawsuits against the right-wing talk channel, alleging that the network's lawyers coerced her into providing misleading testimony in Dominion Voting Systems' $1.6 billion defamation case against the company.

title: Taiwan's President to transit US on Central America trip, but no word on meeting with Speaker McCarthy
description: Taiwan confirmed Tuesday that President Tsai Ing-wen will transit the United States en route to Central America at the end of the month, but there was no word on whether a highly anticipated meeting with US House Speaker Kevin McCarthy will take place.

title: China bills itself as a Ukraine peacemaker but US says Xi's talks with Putin provide 'diplomatic cover' for war
description: Xi Jinping sits down for a second day of talks with Russian President Vladimir Putin on Tuesday but Western allies remain skeptical of any breakthrough over the war in Ukraine with Washington saying the Chinese leader's visit provides "diplomatic cover" for Moscow.

title: China imports 27 foreign video games as it reopens market to global titles
description: China has approved 27 foreign video games, including titles to be released by Tencent, NetEase and Bilibili, as it gradually reopens the world's largest mobile entertainment market to international titles.

title: DeSantis needles Trump as he breaks silence on hush money case
description:
• New York, DC officials prepare for possible Trump indictment
• Analysis: Republicans use Trump's playbook to defend him ahead of possible indictment

title: Hear DeSantis quip over Trump's hush money case
description: Breaking his silence on Donald Trump's legal troubles, Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis criticized the Manhattan district attorney who is pursuing charges against the former president.

title: Kishida's surprise visit to Ukraine to meet with Zelensky comes as China's leader meets Putin and tells him that China and Russia have 'similar goals'
Japan's prime minister heads to Kyiv as Xi holds talks in Moscow
Russian cruise missiles destroyed in strike in Crimea, Ukraine Defense Ministry says
Russian cruise missiles destroyed in strike in Crimea, Ukraine says
Japan Prime Minister Kishida heading to Ukraine to meet Zelensky
White House says Chinese leader could back Russia troops remaining in Ukraine, adding that US officials still believe he hasn't ruled out providing weapons
Kim Jong Un reveals nuclear counterattack drills against US and South Korea
description: North Korea's Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un revealed his mock nuclear counterattack against the US and South Korea after the two countries took part in joint air drills. CNN's Brian Todd reports.

title: See how Taylor Swift surprised one super fan
description: After a bad accident caused Isabella McCune to miss Taylor Swift's 2018 "Reputation" tour, the singer personally promised McCune she would be invited to her next tour. Five years later, Swift is delivering on that promise with tickets to her highly-anticipated "Eras Tour." CNN affiliate KNXV has the story.
